turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order 2 pizzas from Rosatti's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that the Rosatti's on Chandler Road?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to pick the order up or have it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you want for the first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large, thin crust, Italian sausage with extra tomato sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is the large a sixteen inch thin crust, Italian sausage with extra tomato sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you want for the second pizza/

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a small, thin crust, pepperoni with extra tomato sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: By small, do you mean the 14 inch think crust, pepperoni with extra tomato sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a medium Italian salad as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What dressing do you want on the salad?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the Italian dressing.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I will add a medium Italian salad with Italian dressing. Based on their menu, I show a total of 27.50 before tax. Should I place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I will pick it up as soon as they can have it ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have placed the order and the store quotes 25 minutes for the order to be ready for pick-up It will be $29.18 with tax. The store will text you the receipt on your phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good-bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good-bye
